Localization.Name: Attrition-5 Repeater
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Hurston Dynamics
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 5

More than a simple size five laser repeater, the Attrition-5 from Hurston Dynamics features advanced cascade technology to allow the weapon significant performance improvements the longer it sustains its energy output.
